DOC.detailed_description: Demonstrate equivalent efficacy GP2015 EU-authorized Enbrel patient moderate severe , active ( RA ) inadequate response disease modify anti-rheumatic drug ( DMARD ) include methotrexate ( MTX ) . In addition , data safety profile product , include immunogenicity local tolerability injection site , collect compare . An additional study objective identify potential risk transition Enbrel GP2015 term general safety immunogenicity RA patient
DOC.criteria: Patients least 18 year age RA diagnosis accord ACR 1987 ACR/EULAR 20110 criterion > /= 6 month time baseline visit Patient must active disease define DAS28CRP > /=3.2 Patients must CRP level ULN > 5mg/l ) erythrocyte sedimentation rate ( ESR ) > /=28mm/h Patients must inadequate clinical response MTX dose 1025 mg/wk proper dose escalation accord local standard Previous exposure etanercept past Patients functional status class IV accord ACR 1991 revise criterion History active tuberculosis ( TB ) Presence latent ( inactive ) TB detect image and/or QuantiFERONTB Gold test screening
